news_app.tests package

Submodules

news_app.tests.test_api module

Unit tests for news_app REST API.

This module contains tests for API endpoints including articles, newsletters, publishers, and subscription-based article retrieval.

Test unauthenticated users cannot list articles.

Test editors can update articles.

news_app.tests.test_models module

Unit tests for news_app models.

This module contains tests for all model classes including CustomUser, Publisher, Article, and Newsletter.

news_app.tests.tests module

Comprehensive test suite for the news application.

Tests all user roles, features, and workflows.
